attributes.action: make it harder to get asylum in this country, and offer tax benefits to people using car sharing and the like.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
make it harder for asylum in this country as we are already an extremely heavily populated country and the current laws are overcrowding the country.
The government need to start listening to the current residences of this country on how they want to country to be run, not how we appear to the foreign resident.

this will help reduce the number of people in this country, thus offering a slight relief to overcrowding .

Offering a tax back/benefit to people using car sharing and more economical cars would improve the likelihood of these happening.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
